channel.title: Sociology on Timur Ergen
channel.description: Recent content in Sociology on Timur Ergen

item.title: Vorlesung Soziologische Theorie (University of Oldenburg)
item.description: This lecture covers fundamental sociological concepts and selected theories of the social, covering both classical and contemporary perspectives.

item.title: Soziologie der Klimapolitik (University of Oldenburg)
item.description: The seminar builds on the lecture in Sociological Theory, deepening central concepts and arguments through discussion of latest applications of sociological theory to the problem of climate change.

item.title: Soziologische Forschungspraxis (University of Wuppertal)
item.description: This seminar provides practical skills and reflective knowledge useful for conducting independent social science research projects, combining findings from interdisciplinary science studies with the philosophy and sociology of science.

item.title: Innovation and Society (University of Cologne)
item.description: This seminar introduces social science perspectives on the origins, forms, and effects of innovation, examining where inventions come from how societies shape and are shaped by technological change.
